verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>; For it is <S%H2896>good<s%> to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>; For it is <S%H5273>pleasant<s%>, and <S%H8416>praise<s%> is <S%H5000>comely<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> doth build <S%H1129>up<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; He gathereth <S%H3664>together<s%> the <S%H1760>outcasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
He <S%H7495>healeth<s%> the <S%H7665>broken<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>, And bindeth <S%H2280>up<s%> their <S%H6094>wounds<s%>.
He <S%H4487>counteth<s%> the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars<s%>; He <S%H7121>calleth<s%> them all by their <S%H8034>names<s%>.
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our <S%H113>Lord<s%>, and <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H3581>power<s%>; His <S%H8394>understanding<s%> is <S%H4557>infinite<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> <S%H5749>upholdeth<s%> the <S%H6035>meek<s%>: He <S%H8213>bringeth<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H8213>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>.
Sing <S%H6030><s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%>; Sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%> unto our <S%H430>God<s%>,

Who <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> with <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, Who <S%H3559>prepareth<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> for the <S%H776>earth<s%>, Who maketh <S%H2682>grass<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>.
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> to the <S%H929>beast<s%> his <S%H3899>food<s%>, And to the <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6158>ravens<s%> which <S%H7121>cry<s%>.
He <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> not in the <S%H1369>strength<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse<s%>: He taketh no <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H7785>legs<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> taketh <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3176>him<s%>, In those that hope in his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>.
Praise <S%H7623><s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, O <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; <S%H1984>Praise<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, O <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
For he hath <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of thy <S%H8179>gates<s%>; He hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thy <S%H1121>children<s%> within <S%H7130>thee<s%>.
He <S%H7760>maketh<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>; He <S%H7646>filleth<s%> thee with the <S%H2459>finest<s%> of the <S%H2406>wheat<s%>.
He sendeth <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H565>commandment<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>; His <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7323>runneth<s%> very <S%H4120>swiftly<s%>.
He <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H7950>snow<s%> like <S%H6785>wool<s%>; He <S%H6340>scattereth<s%> the <S%H3713>hoar-frost<s%> like <S%H665>ashes<s%>.
He casteth <S%H7993>forth<s%> his <S%H7140>ice<s%> like <S%H6595>morsels<s%>: Who can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H7135>cold<s%>?
He sendeth <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, and <S%H4529>melteth<s%> <S%H7307>them<s%>: He causeth his wind to <S%H5380>blow<s%>, and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H5140>flow<s%>.
He <S%H5046>showeth<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, His <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
He hath not <S%H6213>dealt<s%> so with any <S%H1471>nation<s%>; And as for his <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, they have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H1984>them<s%>. Praise ye <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>.
